channel.title: Crusade Scape 317, 100% Torva, PVP armors, Looking for Staff
channel.description:
[font=impact][size=36pt][i]Crusade Scape 317![/i][/size][/font]
Hey MoparScape! I'm The Crusader from Crusade Scape, And we're desperatly looking for Admins/Developers to help us configure/code the Server. If you're intrested, join this hamachi network: crusade scape (Lower case) and this hamachi password: 123 site: [url=http://crusader.webuda.com/]http://crusader.webuda.com/ [/url] Client download link: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/wnqtwc2j38gknpp/awesomeclient.rar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/wnqtwc2j38gknpp/awesomeclient.rar[/url]
Here are some pictures of what we have: [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/v4qs8n.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2lnu2yq.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/6s5iz7.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/muwprt.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ik42zd.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/vercdg.png[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/jacaxz.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/35n1qgz.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/os99nr.png[/img]
We use the Run Hero client/source. Come check us out today :)
